Title: Fernox MK III MK3 flushing machine 240v
Description: Using a powerfully targeted freshwater flow, this Fernox MK III Powerflow 240v flushing machine removes sludge, scale and debris from contaminated domestic central heating systems, fast. Compatible with all Fernox Cleaners, this machine restores your boiler's energy efficiency rating and improves your system's overall performance level reducing or eliminating boiler noise and minimising fuel consumption, all in a single visit.

Title: Adey MagnaCleanse complete solution
Description: Making the flushing of central heating systems faster and more effective, the Adey MagnaCleanse flushing system kit contains a filter, connectors and a drain valve. Removing virtually all black iron oxide in a single job, this kit is also capable of reducing standard power flushing times by up to two-thirds, with some central heating systems flushed in just two hours.
